statements: SELECT * FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT age, risk_score FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE risk_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT customer_id, coverage_options FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY risk_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE risk_score < 0.5
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, coverage_options FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE coverage_options LIKE '%flood%'
SELECT customer_id, age, coverage_options FROM FloodInsuranceProfiles WHERE risk_score >= 0.7 ORDER BY age
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM customer_profiles WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insurance_options WHERE risk_factor >= 0.05;
SELECT option_id, coverage_type, deductible FROM insurance_options ORDER BY base_premium DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT name, email, risk_profile FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY risk_profile DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM customer_profiles WHERE risk_profile = 'High' ORDER BY birth_date ASC;
SELECT option_id, coverage_type, base_premium FROM insurance_options WHERE deductible <= 500.00 ORDER BY base_premium DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT plan_name, coverage_amount FROM FloodInsurancePlans WHERE deductible_amount < 500;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, selected_date FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN CustomerCoverageSelection ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = CustomerCoverageSelection.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE risk_profile = 'high';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_age DESC;

SELECT customer_name, plan_name FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN CustomerCoverageSelection ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = CustomerCoverageSelection.customer_id JOIN FloodInsurancePlans ON CustomerCoverageSelection.plan_id = FloodInsurancePlans.plan_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_name, risk_profile FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE risk_profile = 'high';
SELECT * FROM customer_profile;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, risk_score FROM customer_profile;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, date_of_birth FROM customer_profile WHERE risk_score > 50;
SELECT option_name, coverage_type, premium_cost FROM policy_options WHERE deductible < 500;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM risk_factors ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth, address FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_options WHERE premium_cost > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, risk_score FROM customer_profile ORDER BY risk_score DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, rf.factor_name, rf.weight FROM customer_profile c INNER JOIN customer_risk_factors crf ON c.customer_id = crf.customer_id INNER JOIN risk_factors rf ON crf.factor_id = rf.factor_id;
SELECT customer_name, coverage_type, premium_cost FROM customer_profile cp INNER JOIN policy_options po ON cp.risk_score >= 7 AND po.coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM risk_profiles WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT option_name, premium_amount FROM coverage_options WHERE premium_amount < 1000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT option_name, premium_amount FROM coverage_options WHERE premium_amount > 500 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM risk_profiles WHERE risk_category = 'High Risk' ORDER BY risk_score DESC LIMIT 4;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
